about_the_game:
Relive the melodies of your grand adventure, Arisen!

The Dragon's Dogma 2 Original Soundtrack has arrived, complete with 87 tracks that weave the tale of your journey with your Pawns. Bend your ear to these masterworks and let them stir the fire of adventure in you anew!

Dragon's Dogma 2 is a single player, narrative driven action-RPG set in a truly immersive fantasy world just waiting to be explored. With your loyal Pawns by your side, you'll embark on a journey so unique you will feel as if accompanied by other players while on an adventure all your own.
